roleset.name: like a criminal

example.name: difficult syntax for crime
example.text: Since Mexican President Carlos Salinas de Gortari took office last December , special agents have arrested more than 6,000 federal employees on charges ranging from extortion to tax evasion .

propbank.arg: Since Mexican President Carlos Salinas de Gortari took office last December
on charges ranging from extortion to tax evasion

example.name: NP only, all arguments
example.text: the arrest of opposition activists on the grounds of terrorism

example.name: NP only, Args 0 & 1
example.text: the arrest by West German authorities of five young West Germans , accused of stealing information from computers in the U.S. and Europe and selling it to the Soviet KGB

propbank.arg: of five young West Germans , accused of stealing information from computers in the U.S. and Europe and selling it to the Soviet KGB

example.name: All arguments
example.text: Information passed to Crimestoppers resulted in a milestone figure of the 100,000th arrest , following the arrest of a man by Durham Police for burglary .

roleset.note: ARREST-V NOTES: I'd expect to see arg2-for more commonly, but I could be mistaken. (from arrest.01-v)
ARREST-N NOTES: Roleset based on verb arrest.01, OntoNotes grouping arrest-n sense 1; no mapping to VN. Framed by Claire. (from arrest.01-n)

roleset.name: stop

example.name: arrested development
example.text: China might stave off a crisis if it acts as forcefully as it did to arrest the 1985 decline , when Beijing slammed the brakes on foreign - exchange spending and devalued the currency .

propbank.arg: when Beijing slammed the brakes on foreign - exchange spending and devalued the currency

example.name: Arg 1 as "of" PP
example.text: The medication is very effective in the arrest of the disease 's progress .

example.name: Arg 1 pre-relation
example.text: The patient was experiencing cardiac arrest .

example.name: All arguments
example.text: Thus , the arrest of egg maturation by allatectomy might be due to the failure of the corpora allata to stimulate the mnc .

roleset.note: ARREST-V NOTES: Frames file for 'arrest' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No Verbnet entry. (from arrest.02-v predicate notes)
ARREST-N NOTES: Roleset based on verb entry arrest.02, OntoNotes grouping arrest-n sense 2; no mapping to VN. Framed by Claire. (from arrest.02-n)
